column4: Hello Ubuntu users, after updating my system the X server fails to load the nVidia module and quits with "no screens found". What should I do?
the kernel updates are messing nVidia and ATI, don't update, and tell your friends.
evil has has happened already, how do I fix it?

some people say the problem is already fixed, but I say not. They say it is NOT the kernel's problem but the "unofficial modules" which need also to be updated. I can't tell you specifics since I don't own ATI or nVidia.
